Subject: New questions impact
DataQuery: SELECT DISTINCT SQ.Process, SQ.StatementLinkUniqueID, SQ.Audit_Statement_Name, SQ.Level_Prefix, SQ.Baseline
CASE WHEN ssd.SnapShot_ID <> 1 THEN ssd.Discipline_Version ELSE 'Live' END AS baseline,
CASE WHEN (SELECT TOP 1 ssd2.IDtbAudits_Questions FROM tbSnap_Shots_Data AS ssd2
JOIN tbASPICE_Questions as q on q.ID = bpq.IDtbASPICE_Questions
JOIN tbASPICE_Base_Practices as bp on bp.ID = bpq.IDtbASPICE_Base_Practices
JOIN tbASPICE_Processes as p on p.ID = bp.IDtbASPICE_Processes
JOIN tbSnap_Shots_Data as ssd on ssd.StatementLinkUniqueID = q.StatementLinkUniqueID AND ssd.SnapShot_ID = bpq.SnapShot_ID
HtmlTemplate: This is an automatic email aiming to alert you on the impact on ASPICE processes due to a recent change in one or more questions
